abstract: The Obama administration approved the first oil drilling plan for the company in the Gulf of Mexico since an explosion sank the Deepwater Horizon rig more than a year ago.
snippet: The Obama administration approved the first oil drilling plan for the company in the Gulf of Mexico since an explosion sank the Deepwater Horizon rig more than a year ago.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON — The Obama administration on Friday took another step toward allowing BP to return to the Gulf of Mexico, approving the first oil drilling plan for the company there since the explosion that sank the Deepwater Horizon rig more than a year ago.

headline.main: BP’s Plan for Drilling in the Gulf Is Approved
headline.print_headline: BP’s Plan For Drilling In the Gulf Is Approved
